resources.string: We just need to ask you a few quick questions so we can calculate your recommended daily calories and help you achieve your goals
Its never too late to change the goal !!
NOT VERY ACTIVE - Spend most of the day sitting, minimum movement.
LIGHTLY ACTIVE - Spend a good part of the day on your feet (eg. teacher , salesperson)
ACTIVE -Spend a good part of the day doing some physical activity( eg. food server , postal carrier)
VERY ACTIVE- Spend most of the day doing heavy physical activity (eg. warehouse worker , carpenter )
Spend most of the day sitting (eg. bank , teller , desk job)
Spend a good part of the day on your feet (eg. teacher , salesperson)
Spend a good part of the day doing some physical activity( eg. food server , postal carrier)
Spend most of the day doing heavy physical activity (eg. warehouse worker , carpenter )
